original_title: 椎 香 椎 り あ
overview: Ria Kashi got married and is living in the same household with the parents.  One day, the brother of the husband returns home, penniless, as he has been the victim of a marriage scam and even lost his job. The whole family despises and resents him for his bad life choices and for not following their advice back then.  Ria, however, has sympathy for him.
title: Tropical Night – Ria Kashii
